title: league won't open
body: When I try to open league nothing happens, it just sits there. I usually have to restart my computer. If anyone has a solution that doesn't require restarting my computer,  please write it in the comments, thank you.

replies.body:
I've seen this quite a bit over my time here at PS. I've usually seen this caused by certain network settings that conflict with League. Working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be my advice, since the steps within commonly resolve these issues.

Let me know if this caused any change.
Yeah this is happening to a few people ive seen so far, happening to me as well. We just have to sit back and wait until a rioter sees it.
